text: Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov () (May 29, 1965 â€“ April 21, 2015) was a Russian movie director, producer and screenwriter. He was known for his comedy movie Luna Papa (1999). He won a Silver Lion at the Venice Film Festival for his movie Kosh ba kosh (1993). Khudojnazarov died from a short illness in Berlin, Germany, aged 49. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1965 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Russian movie directors Category:Russian movie producers Category:Russian screenwriters
title: Bakhtyar Khudojnazarov
